library.name: Scale Benchmark Charts
library.description: Interactive benchmark charts powered by ApexCharts

components.name: GrowthChart
components.description: Displays growth metrics (Y/Y ARR, iCAGR, NNARR, Fwd ARR)

components.name: BurnChart
components.description: Displays burn metrics (Burn Multiple, Rule of 40, Operating Margin)

components.name: ChurnChart
components.description: Displays churn metrics (Annualized Gross Churn, Annualized Retention)

components.name: EfficiencyChart
components.description: Displays efficiency metrics (Net Sales, Gross Sales, Magic Number)

components.name: BenchmarkCharts
components.description: Displays all 4 benchmark charts with shared revenue range controls
